description: The releases pipeline deploys to the test and production resource groups for the data services team's Azure analytics solution

inputs.Inline:
# You can write your azure powershell scripts inline here. 
# You can also pass predefined and custom variables to this script using arguments

# You can write your azure powershell scripts inline here. 
# You can also pass predefined and custom variables to this script using arguments

# You can write your azure powershell scripts inline here. 
# You can also pass predefined and custom variables to this script using arguments

workflowTasks.name: Whitelist DevOps IP for Key Vault

inputs.inlineScript:
thisIp=$(curl ipinfo.io/ip)

echo ${thisIp}

az keyvault network-rule add \
--name kv-lbmc-diexp-dw \
--ip-address ${thisIp} \
--resource-group rg-lbmc-diexp-ancilliary-dw

workflowTasks.name: Get Database Password from Key Vault

inputs.inlineScript:
thisIp=$(curl ipinfo.io/ip)

echo ${thisIp}

az keyvault network-rule remove \
--name kv-lbmc-diexp-dw \
--ip-address ${thisIp} \
--resource-group rg-lbmc-diexp-ancilliary-dw

az functionapp config appsettings set --name test-data-integration-app-python \
     --resource-group rg-lbmc-diexp-test-dw \
     --settings "AZURE_SUBSCRIPTION_ID=$(azure-sub-id)" "FUNCTIONS_EXTENSION_VERSION=~3" "FUNCTIONS_WORKER_RUNTIME=python"
